gradients.js.name: Gradients
gradients.js.description: Applies a color gradient to the messages you send.

greentext.js.name: Greentext
greentext.js.description: Lets you do greentext by prefixing your message with the > character.

hide-bots.js.name: Hide Bots
hide-bots.js.description: Hides channel bots from the users list.

highlighter.js.name: Highlighter
highlighter.js.description: Highlights messages which contain any of the phrases you configure. Useful to highlight messages containing your nickname or other words of interest.

lucky.js.name: Lucky
lucky.js.description: Creates a `/lucky` command, which searches YouTube using the query following the command, and queues the first video found.

macros.js.name: Macros
macros.js.description: Gives users the option to create macros, or 'shortcuts' for long messages.

protection.js.name: Protection
protection.js.description: Provides protection against trolls and other nasty users.

react.js.name: React
react.js.description: Creates a `/react` command, which displays a random image from http://replygif.net based on your search term. Now includes auto complete suggestions.

scriptster.js.name: Scriptster
scriptster.js.description: Tools for upnext.fm script writers. Turns the script editor into a full IDE and adds a 'Scripting' button to the site navigation bar.

azannoybutton.js.name: Az Irritation Button
azannoybutton.js.description: Adds a button that sends a message to a bot. bot then adds to a count of irritations per username. super basic.
